00050    function getRoles($userRef,$getNamedIds=true)
00051    { 
00052                 $userId = $this->getIdFromRef($userRef);
00053                 if ( ! $userId )
00054                 {
00055                         $this->raiseError("qx::security::user::getRoles : invalid user reference '$userRef'.");
00056                 }
00057 
00058                 if ($getNamedIds === null)
00059                 {
00060                         return $this->db->getAllRows("
00061                                 SELECT 
00062                                         r.*
00063                                 FROM 
00064                                         `{$this->role->table}` as r,
00065                                         `{$this->table_link_user_roles}` as l
00066                                 WHERE
00067                                         r.`{$this->role->key_id}` = l.`{$this->role->foreignKey}`
00068                                         AND l.`{$this->foreignKey}` = $userId
00069                         "); 
00070 
00071                 }
00072                 
00073                 $rows = $this->db->getAllRows("
00074                         SELECT
00075                                 r.`{$this->role->key_id}` as id,
00076                                 r.`{$this->role->key_namedId}` as nameId
00077                         FROM 
00078                                 `{$this->role->table}` as r,
00079                                 `{$this->table_link_user_roles}` as l
00080                         WHERE
00081                                 r.`{$this->role->key_id}` = l.`{$this->role->foreignKey}`
00082                                 AND l.`{$this->foreignKey}` = $userId
00083                 ");
00084                         
00085                 $result = array();
00086                 foreach ( $rows as $row )
00087                 {
00088                         $result[] = $getNamedIds ? $row['nameId'] : (int) $row['id'];
00089                 }
00090                 return $result;
00091    }

00096         function getRoleIds($userRef)
00097         {
00098                 return $this->getRoles($userRef,false);

00105         {
00106                 return $this->getRoles($userRef,true);

00112         function getRoleRecords($userRef)
00113         {
00114                 return $this->getRoles($userRef,null);  
00115         }

00125    function getPermissions($userRef,$getNamedIds=true)
00126    {
00127                 $userId = $this->getIdFromRef($userRef);
00128                 if ( ! $userId )
00129                 {
00130                         $this->raiseError("qx::security::user::getPermissions : invalid user reference '$userRef'.");
00131                 }
00132                 
00133                 $myRoles = $this->getRoles($userRef,$getNamedIds);
00134                 
00135                 $result = array();
00136                 foreach ( $myRoles as $roleRef )
00137                 {
00138                         $result = array_unique(array_merge(
00139                                 $result,
00140                                 $this->role->getPermissions( $roleRef, $getNamedIds )
00141                         ));
00142                 }
00143                 return $result;
00144    }
00145    
00151    function authenticate ( $username, $password )
00152    {
00153                 $row = $this->getByName ( $username );
00154                 
00155                 if ( ! is_array($row) )
00156                 {
00157                         $this->error = "Unknown user name";
00158                         $this->setActiveUser(null);
00159                         return false;
00160                 }
00161                 
00162                 $savedPw = $row[$this->key_password]; 
00163                 
00164                 if ( ! $savedPw or 
00165                           $password === $savedPw or   
00166                           md5( $password ) === $savedPw or
00167                           $password === md5 ( $savedPw ) ) 
00168                 {
00169                         $this->setActiveUser($row);
00170                         return true;
00171                 }
00172                 else
00173                 {
00174                         $this->error = "Wrong Password";
00175                         $this->setActiveUser(null);
00176                         return false;
00177                 }
00178    }
00179

00185    {
00186                 return $_SESSION['qcl_auth_user_activeUser']; 
00187    }
00188    
00193    function setActiveUser($data)
00194    {
00195                 $_SESSION['qcl_auth_user_activeUser'] = $data;
00196    }

00206    function hasPermission($requestedPermission, $user=null)
00207    {
00208                 $user                   = $user ? $this->getByName($user) : $this->getActiveUser();
00209                 $username               = $user[$this->key_namedId];
00210                 $permissions    = $this->getPermissions($username);
00211                 foreach($permissions as $permission)
00212                 {
00213                         if ( $permission == $requestedPermission )
00214                         {
00215                                 return true;
00216                         }
00217                         elseif ( strstr($permission,"*") )
00218                         {
00219                                 $pos = strpos($permission,"*");
00220                                 if ( substr($permission,0,$pos) == substr($requestedPermission,0,$pos) )
00221                                 {
00222                                         return true;
00223                                 }
00224                         }
00225                 }
00226                 // permission was not found
00227                 return false;
00228    }
00229    
00235    function requirePermission($permission)
00236    {
00237                 if ( $this->hasPermission($permission) )
00238                 {
00239                         return true;
00240                 }
00241                 else
00242                 {
00243                         $this->raiseError("Permission denied");
00244                 }
00245    }
00246    
00252     function getSecurity($username)
00253     {
00254                 // userdata
00255                 $userdata = $this->getByName($username);
00256                 unset($userdata[$this->key_password]);
00257                 $roleNamedIds = $this->getRoles($username);
00258 
00259                 // roles and permissions
00260                 $roles = array();
00261                 $roleDescriptiveNames = array();
00262                 foreach ( $roleNamedIds as $roleNamedId )
00263                 {
00264                         
00265                         $roleDescriptiveNames[] = $this->role->getDescriptiveName($roleNamedId);
00266                         $roles[$roleNamedId]    = $this->role->getPermissions($roleNamedId);
00267                 }
00268                 
00269                 // security policy data for client
00270                 $userdata['roles'] = implode(", ",$roleDescriptiveNames);
00271                 $userdata['icon']  = $this->icon;
00272                 $security = array(
00273                         'userdata'      => $userdata,
00274                         'roles'         => $roles
00275                 );
00276                 return $security;
00277     }
00278 
00284     function addToRole( $userRefs, $roleRefs )
00285     {
00286         $userRefs       = (array) $userRefs;
00287         $roleRefs       = (array) $roleRefs;
00288         
00289         foreach ( $userRefs as $userRef )
00290         {
00291                 $userId = $this->getIdFromRef($userRef);
00292                 if ( ! $userId )
00293                 {
00294                         $this->raiseError("Invalid user reference: $userRef");
00295                 }
00296                 foreach ( $roleRefs as $roleRef )
00297                 {
00298                         $roleId = $this->role->getIdFromRef($roleRef);
00299                         if ( ! $roleId )
00300                         {
00301                                 $this->raiseError("Invalid role reference: $roleRef");
00302                         }
00303                         $row = array();
00304                         $row[$this->role->foreignKey] = $roleId;
00305                         $row[$this->foreignKey] = $userId; 
00306                         $this->db->insert($this->table_link_user_roles,$row);
00307                 }
00308         }       
00309         return true;
00310     }
00311 
00317     function removeFromRole( $userRefs, $roleRefs  )
00318     {
00319         $userRefs       = (array) $userRefs;
00320         $roleRefs       = (array) $roleRefs;
00321         
00322         foreach( $userRefs as $userRef )
00323         {
00324                 $userId = $this->getIdFromRef($userRef);
00325                 if ( ! $userId )
00326                 {
00327                         $this->raiseError("Invalid user reference: $userRef");
00328                 }
00329                 
00330                 foreach ( $roleRefs as $roleRef )
00331                 {
00332                         $roleId = $this->role->getIdFromRef($roleRef);
00333                         if ( ! $roleId )
00334                         {
00335                                 $this->raiseError("Invalid role reference: $roleRef");
00336                         }
00337                                 $this->db->execute("
00338                                         DELETE FROM `{$this->table_link_user_roles}`
00339                                         WHERE   `{$this->foreignKey}` = $userId
00340                                         AND     `{$this->role->foreignKey}` = $roleId
00341                                 ");
00342                 }
00343         }
00344         return true;
00345     }

00354    function method_updateClient($params)
00355    {
00356                 return $this->method_authenticate($params);
00357    }   
00358    
00364    function method_authenticate($params)
00365    {
00366                 $username       = utf8_decode($params[0]);
00367                 $password       = utf8_decode($params[1]);
00368                 $activeUser = $this->getActiveUser();
00369                 
00370                 // authenticate user if password matches
00371                 if ( $username and $this->authenticate ( $username, $password ) )
00372                 {
00373                         $security = $this->getSecurity($username);
00374                         $this->setActiveUser($security['userdata']);
00375                         $this->addMessage("qcl.auth.messages.loginSuccess");                                            
00376                 }
00377                 elseif ( ! $username and $activeUser )
00378                 {
00379                         $security = $this->getSecurity($activeUser[$this->key_username]);
00380                         $this->addMessage("qcl.auth.messages.loginSuccess");
00381                 }
00382                 else
00383                 {
00384                         $security = null;
00385                         $this->setActiveUser(null);
00386                         $this->addMessage( "qcl.auth.messages.loginFailed", $this->error );
00387                 }
00388                 
00389                 $this->set("security", $security );
00390                 
00391                 return $this->getResult();
00392    }   
00393    
00397    function method_logout()
00398    {
00399                 $this->setActiveUser(null);
00400                 $this->addMessage("qcl.auth.messages.user.loggedOut");
00401                 return $this->getResult();
00402    }   
00403 
00410     function method_addToRole($params)
00411     {
00412         $this->requirePermission("qcl.auth.manage");
00413         
00414         $userRefs       = $params[1];
00415         $roleRefs       = $params[2];
00416         
00417         $this->addToRole($userRefs,$roleRefs); 
00418         $this->addMessage("qcl.auth.messages.user.roleAdded",$userRefs);
00419         return $this->getResult();
00420     }
00421    
00428     function method_removeFromRole($params)
00429     {
00430         $this->requirePermission("qcl.auth.manage");
00431         
00432         $userRefs       = $params[1];
00433         $roleRefs       = $params[2];
00434 
00435         $this->removeFromRole($userRefs,$roleRefs);
00436 
00437         $this->addMessage("qcl.auth.messages.user.roleRemoved",$userRefs); 
00438         return $this->getResult();
00439     }
